data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: bottom-mounted ADCP data: Purisima Point, California, USA (PUR)

This metadata record describes bottom-mounted ADCP data collected at Purisima Point, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using an RDI 600 kHz Workhorse Sentinel ADCP beginning 1999-09-04. The instrument depth was 015 meters, in an overall water depth of 15 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The instrument was programmed with a sampling interval of 2.0 minutes and a vertical resolution of 1 meter.
